data.message:
Dearest creature in creation
  Studying rap pronunciation
  I will teach you in my verse
     Sounds like corpse,horse and worse

I will make you busy
   Make your head with heat grow dizzy
Tear in eye, your dress you will tear
Now quickly you fair seer,god hear my prayer
Play your console like poem loving poet
Make your coat look new,dear sew it

Just compare my heart ,hear and heard
Dies in diet,lord m out of word
Reward by sword,detained form Britain
Mind the line how its written
  The new maid is sharp like blade
She said pay I paid I got her laid 
  That well I played
Sitting in the car at evening smoking cigar
Going and grabbing beers from the bar
Thinking about the fights and awful war
Looking at solar flames that are too far
Wearing hard shoes of leather
Whether I told you about todays weather

Have you ever yet endeavoured
To pronounce reversed served

The demon took my soul
Because I looked so small
You are all over my heart
Look through my eyes they are the keyhole
